text: You probably forgot to select the 'module's folder inside the extra contrib folder. Exact error happened to me when I only selected the extra contrib folder.
The server isnt waiting for any data from the client, and when the server exits the connection will be closed. Add a ins.readLine() to the server code like this:

In my case it was related to Client authentication. It happened to me when I was trying to access SOAP API from Java code without setting keystore/keystorePassword and from the stacktrace there is no way we can figure out that there's a problem with Authentication.
